The epitome of a bad tourist restaurant.  The only reason I gave it 2 stars is that if all you want to do is have a glass of wine and watch folks in the plaza this is probably about as good as you can get.  On the other hand if you want to eat, the food is barely edible.  My wife's tuna could not be eaten and tasted like it had gone bad at least a day earlier.  To my chagrin two days later a cab driver recommended I not eat anywhere near las Ramblas, which I do not agree.  Any other randomly selected restaurant would have to have better food than this place.
